about_the_game:
Welcome to Misery
The Daylight Town


Was that the right turn? You could have sworn this was the short cut you've taken a dozen times, but nothing looks familiar. To make matters worse, your car just started making an unpleasant groan as you feel something under the hood lurch. All hope might not be lost: you're stopped in front of a farm, and only a few miles away from the next town: Misery. Between the farm and the township, you believe that someone should be able to help you. You're dead wrong.

Welcome to In Misery - Episode 1: The Farm

In the single-player, horror anthology series In Misery, your main goal is simple: make it out alive. The Farm has an exploratory landscape that allows you to uncover the dark history of the Montgomery Family while collecting achievements.

In Misery Achievements:
    Save the Other VictimsCollect and Destroy Ritual Items


ATTACK
You can attack the farmers and stun them, but you cannot kill them.

RUN
You're just a bit faster than the farmer, use it to your advantage.

HIDE
Crouching behind objects will make it harder for the farmer to see you.

SCOUR THE FARM FOR SUPPLIES
Find tools, light sources, first aid supplies, and more.

MATURE CONTENT DESCRIPTION
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

content_descriptors.notes: As a player, you will experience being attacked by someone wielding an axe who is planning to use you for human sacrifice and therefore must defend yourself, run and hide. Needless to say, this game is not suitable for all audiences, player discretion is advised.

short_description: Lost on an unfamiliar back road in one of the most remote parts of Missouri, you stop in a small town called Misery for help, but what you find is much worse. In the single-player, exploratory, horror anthology series "In Misery", your main goal is simple: make it out alive.
